title: Hilo International Airport
context: AIRPORTS §261-22 Hilo International Airport. The official name of the airport situated at Waiakea, Hilo, Hawaii, shall be Hilo International Airport. The main passenger terminal at Hilo International Airport shall be designated &ldquo;General Lyman Terminal&rdquo; in memory of Brigadier General Albert Lyman, the first person of Hawaiian ancestry to attain such rank in the United States Army. [L 1943, JR 5; RL 1945, §4931; RL 1955, §15-26; HRS §261-22; am L 1989, c 59, §1]
